data.title: 國立臺灣大學應用力學研究所
data.meta_description: 本所教育目標在培育具有領導及獨立研究能力的力學相關領域之高級專業人才
data.text:
Job Title：Distinguished Professor

E-mail：mechang iam.ntu.edu.tw

Tel：02-33665672

Fax：02-23625238

Office：Room 408

Lab：Room 422 Biomedical Imaging Laboratory

Education：

Experience：

Courses Taught：

Admission

Research Interests：

Honors & Awards：

Publications：

PhD (Mathematics), University of California, Berkeley, 1985

BS (Chemical Engineering), National Taiwan University, 1980

Director, Institute of Applied Mechanics, National Taiwan University (2009.8-)

Joint Research Fellow, Research Center for Applied Sciences, Academia Sinica (2009.8-)

IUTAM Taiwan Representative (國際力學聯盟臺灣 代表) (2010,10-)

President, Taiwanese Society for Angiogenesis (臺灣血管新生學會理事長) (2009.8-2011.7)

Director in Mechanics, Research Center for Applied Sciences, Academia Sinica (2005.7-2009.6)

Professor, Institute of Applied Mechanics, National Taiwan University (1993.8-)

Associate Professor, Institute of Applied Mechanics, National Taiwan University (1987.8-1993.7)

Visiting Professor, Department of Mathematics, HKUST, Hong Kong (2004.1-2)

Visiting Professor, Department of Applied Physics and Applied Mathematics, Columbia University (1997.11)

Research Associate, Division of Engineering Science, California Institute of Technology (1987 summer)

Applied Mathematics

Advanced Applied Mathematics

Analytical Dynamics

Advanced Analytical Dynamics

Electromagnetics

Molecualr Dynamics

Numerical Analysis/Methods

Statistical Thermodynamics

Special Topics on Rotating Fluids

張建成擬指導之研究課題 Research Topics for Prospective Students

Biomedical Imaging (ultrasound, optical coherence tomography)-small animals and human tissues (theory and measurements)

Theory and Application of Microstructures (graphene, carbon nanotube, periodic structures)-mechanics, heat transfer of microstructures (theory, computation and experiments)

Energy Research (wind energy, solar energy, lithium battery)-vibration and fluid mechanics of wind plates (theory, computation and experiments)

Biomimetics Research (locomotion of birds, fish and microorganisms) -locomotion of small insects (theory, computation and experiments)

Electrokinetics, fabrication techniques in nano- and micro-fluidics, transport, mixing and separation-fast transport by geometry modification (theory, computation and experiments)

生醫量測與影像技術(超音波， 同調光學) Biomedical Imaging (ultrasound, optical coherence tomography)

微奈米 材料理論與實用(石墨烯， 奈米碳管， 週期材料) Theory and Application of Microstructures (graphene, carbon nanotube, periodic structures

能源技術分析與實驗(風能， 太陽能，鋰電池設計) Energy Research (wind energy, solar energy, lithium battery)

仿生流理論， 計算與 實驗(鳥飛、 魚游， 微生物泳動力學) Biomimetics Research (locomotion of birds, fish and microorganisms)

微奈米 流道電動分析、製作與輸送、混合、 分離等技術 Electrokinetics, fabrication techniques in nano- and micro-fluidics, transport, mixing and separation

臺灣大學特聘教授/Distinguished Professor, National Taiwan University (since 2007.8)

國際電磁學院會士/Fellow of the Electromagnetics Academy (since 2007.8)

FAOS 傑出人才講座/Outstanding Scholar, the Foundation for the Advancement of Outstanding Scholarship (2009.8-2014.7)

國科會傑出獎與傑出學者計畫/National Science Council, Outstanding Research Awards, Research Project (1995.8-1999.7, 2008.8-2011.7)
